mapper.select: SELECT SI.STORE_SEQ , SI.COUNT_STORE , SI.STORE_NAME , SI.STORE_ADDRESS , SI.MENU_NAME , SI.REVIEW , MI.FILE_PATH , MI.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , MI.FILE_MASKING_NAME FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN MENU_IMG MI ON MI.QUESTION_SEQ = SI.QUESTION_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND SI.STORE_SEQ = #{store_seq}

SELECT STORE_SEQ , COUNT_STORE , STORE_NAME , MI.FILE_PATH , MI.FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , MI.FILE_MASKING_NAME FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN MENU_IMG MI ON MI.QUESTION_SEQ = SI.QUESTION_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND (si.store_seq = (SELECT store_seq FROM MYTASTE_COUNT WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY count_store DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 0) OR si.store_seq = (SELECT store_seq FROM MYTASTE_COUNT WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY count_store DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1) OR si.store_seq = (SELECT store_seq FROM MYTASTE_COUNT WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY count_store DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2) OR si.store_seq = (SELECT store_seq FROM MYTASTE_COUNT WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY count_store DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 3))
SELECT user_id , store_seq , menu_count FROM mytaste_count WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{user_id} AND store_seq = #{store_seq}
